name: fe_03_01314
context_text: <B> well i see people um i no longer work but i see people who stand outside their buildings and smoke / <A> uh-huh / <B> and i always think gee when i worked i used to carry the load for the workers who went outside and smoked / <A> exactly / <B> and that can cause resentment / <A> yeah / <B> um the loss time costs money to the business / <A> yeah / <B> uh so i think there are other um advantages to banning smoking / <A> right
